snippet: Three men were arrested in connection with the death of a 23-year-old man in Volgograd, and the findings were a rare acknowledgment during a period of rising antigay sentiment from officials.
abstract: Russian investigators say brutal murder of 23-year-old man in southern city of Volgograd was motivated by homophobia, rare acknowledgment that comes during period of rising conservative and antigay sentiment from Russian officials.
lead_paragraph: Three men were arrested in connection with the death of a 23-year-old man in Volgograd, and the findings were a rare acknowledgment during a period of rising antigay sentiment from officials.

headline.seo: Homophobia Linked to Murder in Russia
headline.main: Officials Say Homophobia Motivated Murder in Russia
headline.print_headline: Officials Say Homophobia Motivated Murder in Russia
